name: Reborn as a Monster 2: Rise of the Beast God
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhua
content: A thousand years ago,With a blood moon hanging in the sky and spatial rifts opening up, the era of monsters descended upon the world. Countless monsters ravaged the globe!
